Tinjau Sekolah Ambruk di Pasuruan, Nadiem Takziah ke Rumah Korban
07 Nov 2019, 14:22 by Antara, Yudono Yanuar
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Nadiem Makarim takziah keluarga korban meninggal dalam insiden sekolah ambruk yakni Irza Almira siswa kelas II SDN Gentong, Kota Pasuruan, Jawa Timur.
Kunjungan yang dilakukan Nadiem itu dilakukan seusai dia meninjau reruntuhan bangunan sekolah yang tak jauh dari rumah korban, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
"Tadi Pak Menteri bilang yang kuat, semoga tidak ada lagi kejadian seperti anak saya. Harus kuat dan tawakal," kata orang tua korban Irza yakni Zubair seusai dikunjungi Nadiem Makarim.
Ia juga berharap kepada Mendikbud supaya kalau ada pembangunan tidak ada lagi pengecilan anggaran atau dikorupsi. "Jangan sampai kalau pembangunan itu ada pengecilan, atau dikorupsi," ujarnya.
Nadiem sendiri, setelah menjenguk keluarga korban enggan memberikan tanggapan meskipun dicegat oleh awak media yang menunggunya di luar rumah duka.
Nadiem saat mengunjungi sekolah ambruk menjelaskan pihaknya sudah mengirim tim dari inspektorat jenderal untuk melakukan investigasi atas apa yang terjadi.
"Sehingga bisa merencanakan bagaimana bisa bersama-sama menghindari kejadian tersebut," katanya.
Dua orang meninggal dunia, yaitu satu siswa dan guru serta belasan siswa lainnya mengalami luka-luka akibat ambruknya atap di SDN Gentong, Kecamatan Gadingrejo, Kota Pasuruan, Selasa (5/11) pukul 08.30 WIB. Gedung sekolah yang ambruk berada di bagian depan terdiri dari empat kelas, yakni kelas 2 A dan B, serta kelas 5 A dan B.

Review the Collapsing School in Pasuruan, Nadiem Takziah to the Victim's Home
Nov 7 2019, 14:22 by Antara, Yudono Yanuar
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Minister of Education and Culture Nadiem Makarim takziah, the family of the victim who died in the collapsed school incident, namely Irza Almira, a grade II student at SDN Gentong, Pasuruan City, East Java.
Nadiem's visit was carried out after he inspected the ruins of a school building not far from the victim's house, Thursday, November 7, 2019.
"Earlier the Minister said that he is strong, that there will be no more incidents like my son. He must be strong and resigned," said Irza's victim, Zubair, after visiting Nadiem Makarim.
He also hoped the Minister of Education and Culture so that if there was development there would be no more budget reduction or corruption. "Don't let the development be reduced or corrupted," he said.
Nadiem himself, after visiting the victim's family, was reluctant to respond despite being intercepted by media crews waiting for him outside the funeral home.
Nadiem when visiting the collapsed school explained that his party had sent a team from the inspectorate general to investigate what had happened.
"So they can plan how they can jointly avoid the incident," he said.
Two people died, namely one student and teacher and dozens of other students were injured due to the roof collapse at SDN Gentong, Gadingrejo District, Pasuruan City, Tuesday (11/5) at 08.30 WIB. The collapsed school building at the front consists of four classes, namely class 2 A and B, and class 5 A and B.
